# Speaker Split - AI-Powered Audio Processing Suite
# By Start My Business Inc.
# https://speakersplit.startmybusiness.us

## About This Application
Speaker Split is an AI-powered audio processing suite that provides three core services:
1. Audio Transcription with Speaker Labels
2. Speaker Audio Separation (Split by Speaker)
3. AI Document Generation from Transcripts

## Target Audience
- Business consultants recording client calls
- Podcast producers needing speaker separation
- Meeting transcription for corporate teams
- Content creators repurposing audio content
- Legal professionals documenting depositions
- Researchers analyzing interview data

## Core Features

### 1. Audio Transcription
- Supports MP3, WAV, M4A, FLAC, OGG, WebM, MP4 formats
- Uses WhisperX AI for 95%+ accuracy
- Automatic speaker diarization (identifies who is speaking)
- Timestamps for each segment
- Copy and download transcript functionality

### 2. Speaker Split
- Separates audio into individual files per speaker
- Supports 2-6 speakers
- Exports as high-quality WAV files
- Preview audio before downloading
- Batch download all speaker files

### 3. Document Generator
- Transforms transcripts into professional HTML documents
- AI-powered content analysis using Claude
- Generates summaries, action items, and insights
- Creates collapsible SOPs and profit projections
- Export as HTML or Word (.docx) format

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 16, React 19, Tailwind CSS v4
- Authentication: Clerk
- AI Processing: WhisperX, Pyannote, Claude API
- Backend: Python FastAPI with GPU acceleration

This application requires authentication. Free accounts available.
Contact support@startmybusiness.us for API integration inquiries.

## Pricing
- Free tier: Limited transcription minutes
- Pro tier: Unlimited processing, priority queue
- Enterprise: Custom integrations, dedicated support
